Term.Name: App for service when available
Term.Definition: An associated application that is intended to be started during the availability period of a service instance

Term.Name: App with media in parallel
Term.Definition: An associated application to be started in parallel with commencing presentation of any A/V media

Term.Name: App controlling media presentation
Term.Definition: An associated application that controls media presentation or has no media

Term.Name: App for outside availability period
Term.Definition: An associated application to be started outside the availability period of a service instance
